faqs.question: What is Aura-Soma?
faqs.answer: Aura-Soma is a unique holistic system that appeared at the end of the last century in Great Britain and is developing to this day. It includes color therapy, numerology, astrology, and the energy-spiritual wisdom of humanity.

faqs.question: What is Aura-Soma’s Mission?
faqs.answer: Aura-Soma's mission is to promote cooperation among all beings in caring for each other and the Earth that sustains us.

faqs.question: What are Aura-Soma products?
faqs.answer: Aura-Soma products are color-based wellness tools that blend botanical extracts, essential oils, crystals, and color vibrations to support personal well-being, self-discovery, and energetic balance through color therapy.

faqs.question: What types of products do you offer?
faqs.answer:
We offer the following Aura-Soma range, including:
- Equilibrium Bottles: dual-colored oil blends for intuitive self-selection and energy balance.
- Pomanders: fragrant aura sprays or drops designed for energetic protection and cleansing.
- Quintessences: aromatic sprays for meditation, inspiration, and higher awareness.
- Rescue Set: Pocket Rescue Equilibrium Oils are your 'AURA-SOMA® First Aid' on the go in an emergency, crisis situation.

faqs.question: What types of Aura-Soma services do you offer?
faqs.answer:
Most of these services are available online or one-on-one consultation:
- Aura-Soma ID
- Express consultation (personal daily tip)
- Classic consultation
- Mega consultation
- Mandala reading
- Colorful forecasts on major world events (political, economic, etc.)
- Aura-Soma year forecast
- Aura-Soma retreat
- More offers, courses, and B2B opportunities you may find at www.velana.net/aurasoma and www.velana.net/cooperation

faqs.question: How can I book the Aura-Soma consultation?
faqs.answer: You may book your consultation in one click: https://velana.net/aurasoma#offers

faqs.question: Are your products authentic?
faqs.answer: Yes - our products come directly from the Aura-Soma Products Ltd. (UK) factory and are guaranteed to be 100% authentic.

faqs.question: Where are Aura-Soma products made?
faqs.answer: They are made in Tetford, Lincolnshire, UK.

faqs.question: Are Aura-Soma products organic?
faqs.answer: Aura-Soma claims that its products are produced biodynamically and naturally, the Aura-Soma products are not organic/bio certified.

faqs.question: Are Aura-Soma products vegan?
faqs.answer: No, Aura-Soma products are not vegan certified, and are not PETA approved.

faqs.question: Are Aura-Soma products sustainable?
faqs.answer: There is no certified information about it, as well as there are no recycling or other sustainable pictograms on Aura-Soma packaging. You can find more expert info about it on the LinkedIn company page 'Velana'.

faqs.question: How much do Aura-Soma products cost?
faqs.answer:
- Equilibrium Bottles: 47€ each.
- Pomanders, Quintessence, and Rescue bottle: 27€ each.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer:
We accept:
- Stripe: Major credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, AmEx)
- PayPal
- Bank transfer (selected regions)

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts or bundles?
faqs.answer:
Yes, apply via email to info@velana.net. We provide:
- Birthday discount code
- Bundle discounts of 3-5 products (e.g., discounted sets of Pomanders)
- Seasonal sales and promotions

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes - you can buy products after your personal consultation. Yes - shipping is available worldwide. Rates and times vary by destination.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer:
- Local deliveries: 2–5 business days
- International deliveries: typically 7–14 business days.

faqs.question: Do you provide tracking?
faqs.answer: Yes - you will receive a tracking number via email once your order ships.

faqs.question: Can I return Aura-Soma products?
faqs.answer: Opened or used items cannot be returned for health and safety reasons. However, unopened and unused items can be returned within 14 days of delivery.

faqs.question: What if my product arrives damaged or defective?
faqs.answer: Contact us immediately with your order number and photos. We will replace or refund damaged items at no extra cost.

faqs.question: How do I start a return?
faqs.answer: Email info@velana.net with your order details. We'll provide the return address and instructions. Return shipping is the customer’s responsibility unless the item is defective or damaged.
